00019 #ifndef _IQ_BUFFER_HPP_cm101004_

00022 #include <iostream>
00023 #include <iterator>
00024 #include <algorithm>

00028 #include <boost/bind.hpp>

00030 #include "logging.hpp"
00031 
00032 namespace Internal {
00033   // modulo counter without using the % operation
00034   template<typename T>
00035   class ModuloCounter {
00036   public:
00037     explicit ModuloCounter(T m) : m_(m), t_(0) {}    
00038 
00039     T m() const { return m_; }
00040     operator T() const { return t_; }
00041 
00042     void setM(T m) {
00043       m_= m;
00044       t_ = T(0);
00045     }
00046 
00047     ModuloCounter& operator++() {
00048       const T tInc(t_+1);
00049       t_ = (tInc >= m_) ? T(0) : tInc;
00050       return *this;
00051     }
00052     ModuloCounter operator++(int) {
00053       ModuloCounter tmp(*this);
00054       ++(*this);
00055       return tmp;
00056     }
00057     ModuloCounter& operator--() {
00058       t_ = (t_ == T(0)) ? m_-1 : t_-1;
00059       return *this;
00060     }
00061     ModuloCounter operator--(int) {
00062       ModuloCounter tmp(*this);
00063       --(*this);
00064       return tmp;
00065     }
00066 
00067   private:
00068     T m_;
00069     T t_;
00070   } ;
00071 }
00072 
00073 class IQBuffer {
00074 public:
00075   typedef std::complex<double> complex_type;
00076   typedef std::vector<complex_type> Samples;
00077   IQBuffer(size_t n,       // buffer length
00078            double overlap) // overlap \in [-1,1]
00079     : iqVec_(2*n,0)
00080     , n_(n)
00081     , m_(size_t((1. - ol2ol(overlap))*n_+0.5))
00082     , lpi_(0)
00083     , counterModN_(n_)
00084     , counterModM_(m_)
00085     , counterModNM_(m_*n_)
00086     , counterModL_(ol2l(overlap))
00087     , isFull_(false)
00088     , isFirst_(true) {
00089     LOG_INFO(str(boost::format("IQBuffer n=%d m=%d overlap=%f") % n_ % m_ % overlap));
00090   }
00091   
00092 
00093   // returns the remaining unprocessed samples
00094   Samples samples() const {
00095 //     Samples s(lastI1()-lastI0(), 0);
00096 //     std::copy(iqVec_.begin()+lastI0(), iqVec_.begin()+lastI1(), s.begin());
00097     Samples s;
00098     std::copy(iqVec_.begin()+lastI0(), iqVec_.begin()+lastI1(), 
00099               std::back_inserter(s));
00100     return s;
00101   }
00102 
00103   // update with new parameters
00104   void update(size_t n, double overlap) {
00105     iqVec_.resize(2*n);
00106     n_   = n;
00107     m_   = size_t((1.0-ol2ol(overlap))*n_+0.5);
00108     lpi_ = 0;
00109     counterModN_.setM(n_);
00110     counterModM_.setM(m_);
00111     counterModNM_.setM(n_*m_);
00112     counterModL_.setM(ol2l(overlap));
00113     isFull_ = false;
00114     isFirst_ = true;
00115   }
00116 
00117   size_t n() const { return n_; }
00118   size_t m() const { return m_; }
00119   double overlap() const { return 1.0-double(m_)/double(n_); }
00120  
00121   // insert a single sample
00122   template<typename PROCESSOR>
00123   void insert(PROCESSOR* p, const complex_type& c) {
00124     if (isFirst_) 
00125       isFirst_ = false;
00126     else if (!isFull_) 
00127       isFull_ = (counterModN_ == 0);
00128     if (counterModM_ == 0) {
00129       if (counterModL_++ == 0 && isFull_)
00130         p->procIQ(iqVec_.begin()+counterModN_,
00131                   iqVec_.begin()+counterModN_+n_);
00132       lpi_ = (counterModN_+m_) % n_;
00133     }
00134     iqVec_[counterModN_] = iqVec_[counterModN_+n_] = c;
00135     ++counterModN_;
00136     ++counterModM_;
00137     ++counterModNM_;
00138   }
00139   // insert a range of samples
00140   template<typename PROCESSOR>
00141   void insert(PROCESSOR* p, Samples::const_iterator begin, Samples::const_iterator end) {
00142     void (IQBuffer::*fp)(PROCESSOR*, complex_type)(&IQBuffer::insert<PROCESSOR>);
00143     std::for_each(begin, end, boost::bind(fp, this, p, _1));
00144   }
00145 
00146   // for debugging purpose only
00147   void procIQ(Samples::const_iterator i0, 
00148               Samples::const_iterator i1) {
00149     std::cout << "*** procIQ ";
00150     std::copy(i0, i1, 
00151               std::ostream_iterator<std::complex<double> >(std::cout, " "));
00152     std::cout << "***" << std::endl;
00153   }
00154 
00155 protected:
00156 private:
00157   // returns first index of not yet processed samples
00158   size_t lastI0() const {
00159     return lpi_;
00160   }
00161   // returns last index of not yet processed samples
00162   size_t lastI1() const {
00163     return (counterModN_+n_ - lastI0() > n_ 
00164             ? size_t(counterModN_) 
00165             : counterModN_+n_);
00166   }
00167   static double ol2ol(double overlap) {
00168     ASSERT_THROW(std::abs(overlap) <= 1.);
00169     return (overlap < 0.) ? 0.5*(1.+overlap) : overlap;
00170   }
00171   static size_t ol2l(double overlap) {
00172     ASSERT_THROW(std::abs(overlap) <= 1.);
00173     return (overlap < 0.) ? 2 : 1;
00174   }
00175 
00176   Samples iqVec_;
00177   size_t n_;
00178   size_t m_;
00179   size_t lpi_;
00180   Internal::ModuloCounter<size_t> counterModN_;
00181   Internal::ModuloCounter<size_t> counterModM_;
00182   Internal::ModuloCounter<size_t> counterModNM_;
00183   Internal::ModuloCounter<size_t> counterModL_;
00184   bool isFull_;
00185   bool isFirst_;
00186 } ;

00189 #endif // _IQ_BUFFER_HPP_cm101004_
